mapper.select: select ex.ex_id, ex.ex_name, ex.ex_calorie, ex.url from members mem inner join exandroutine ro on mem.ro_id = ro.ro_id inner join exercises ex on ro.ex_id = ex.ex_id where mem.ro_id is not null and mem.id = #{id}
select rc.mem_id, rc.regdate, rc.ex_id, e.ex_name, e.ex_calorie from routinecheck rc inner join exercises e on rc.ex_id = e.ex_id where mem_id = #{id}
